topics.body:
God damn it; a judge has delayed gay marriage in three states.  The thing is though that it's too little too late because the supreme court won't hear gay marriage until a appeals court upholds a ban.  Basically all they're doing is delaying gay marriage at this point and chances are it may last only a couple days.

Also apparently there's a big thing going on politically right now; apparently the big thing politically next for 2016 is prison reform.  Fucking finally.
